languages.text:
The Mastiff fights on its own: it is now an allied participant in combat and acts independently right after the Overseer.
During its turn, the Mastiff’s behavior is predictable: it always moves to the closest enemy and attacks them.

traits.locale_text:
The Mastiff fights on its own: it is now an allied participant in combat and acts independently right after the Overseer.
During its turn, the Mastiff’s behavior is predictable: it always moves to the closest enemy and attacks them.

languages.text:
This cyber-mastiff fights independently and cannot be controlled directly.
During its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, it always moves to the closest enemy and attacks them.
languages.original_text:
Кибермастиф сражается самостоятельно. Управлять им напрямую нельзя.
В свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} он всегда движется к ближайшему врагу и атакует его, если может.

traits.locale_text:

During its turn, it always moves to the closest enemy and attacks them.

This cyber-mastiff fights independently and cannot be controlled directly.
During its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, it always moves to the closest enemy and attacks them.

This cyber-mastiff fights independently and cannot be controlled directly.

languages.text:
Bu siber mastif, bağımsız olarak savaşır ve doğrudan kontrol edilemez.
{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Turu{/g} esnasında her zaman en yakındaki düşmana doğru hareket eder ve ona saldırır.
languages.original_text:
This cyber-mastiff fights independently and cannot be controlled directly.
During its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, it always moves to the closest enemy and attacks them.

traits.locale_text:
Bu siber mastif, bağımsız olarak savaşır ve doğrudan kontrol edilemez.
Turu esnasında her zaman en yakındaki düşmana doğru hareket eder ve ona saldırır.

Bu siber mastif, bağımsız olarak savaşır ve doğrudan kontrol edilemez.
{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Turu{/g} esnasında her zaman en yakındaki düşmana doğru hareket eder ve ona saldırır.

languages.text:
Este cibermastín está luchando por su cuenta y no puede controlarse directamente.
Durante su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, siempre se mueve hacia el enemigo más cercano y le ataca.
languages.original_text:
This cyber-mastiff fights independently and cannot be controlled directly.
During its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, it always moves to the closest enemy and attacks them.

traits.locale_text:
Este cibermastín está luchando por su cuenta y no puede controlarse directamente.
Durante su turno, siempre se mueve hacia el enemigo más cercano y le ataca.

languages.text:
这只生化獒犬目前处于自主战斗状态，无法直接控制。
轮到生化獒犬的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}时，它会移动至最近的敌人身边，发动攻击。
languages.original_text:
This cyber-mastiff fights independently and cannot be controlled directly.
During its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, it always moves to the closest enemy and attacks them.

traits.locale_text:

languages.text:
Dieser Cyber-Mastiff kämpft unabhängig und kann nicht direkt kontrolliert werden.
Während seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} bewegt er sich immer zum nächststehenden Gegner und greift ihn an.
languages.original_text:
This cyber-mastiff fights independently and cannot be controlled directly.
During its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, it always moves to the closest enemy and attacks them.

traits.locale_text:
Dieser Cyber-Mastiff kämpft unabhängig und kann nicht direkt kontrolliert werden.
Während seines Zuges bewegt er sich immer zum nächststehenden Gegner und greift ihn an.

languages.text:
Le cyber-mastiff se bat de manière autonome et ne peut pas être directement contrôlé.
Au cours de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, il se déplace toujours en direction de l'ennemi le plus proche et l'attaque.

languages.text:
サイバーマスチフが独立して戦闘を行い、直接コントロールできない。
その{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の間、常に一番近い敵に向かって移動し、攻撃する。

そのターンの間、常に一番近い敵に向かって移動し、攻撃する。

languages.text:

В свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} он всегда движется к ближайшему врагу и атакует его, если может.
